page.title: 08CLUBS IN LOCHFOOT
page.content: DAY CLUB TIME VENUE NUMBER MON. YOUTH 7-9 HALL 20-25 GUIDES 6-7.30 SCHOOL 6 BROWNIES 6-7.15 SCHOOL 5 TUES. BOWLING 7.30-10 HALL 20 WED. CUBS 6.30-8 SCHOOL 20-25 BADMINTON 7-9.30 HALL 10-15 THURS.KEEP-FIT 7.30-8.30 SCHOOL 10-15 BOWLING (AS FOR TUESDAY) SUN. SUNDAY 10.30-11.15 SCHOOL 15-20 SCHOOL EXCEPT FOR THE KEEP-FIT CLASSES WHICH ARE ORGANISED BY COMMUNITY EDUCATION, ALL OF THE ABOVE ARE ORGANISED AND RUN BY ENTHUSIASTIC AMATEURS,MEMBERS OF THE LOCAL COMMUNITY,MAINLY WOMEN.FOR CLUBS OTHER THAN THESE, PEOPLE TRAVEL TO DUMFRIES.
